flavorText: The Mardu charge reflects the dragon's speed—and its hunger.

name: Rush of Battle
originalText: Creatures you control get +2/+1 until end of turn. Warrior creatures you control gain lifelink until end of turn. (Damage dealt by those Warriors also causes their controller to gain that much life.)

rulings.text: Warrior creatures you control as Rush of Battle resolves gain lifelink in addition to getting +2/+1.
